Text:
Would you guys please show some courtesy?  This isn't even my torrent, and I've already uploaded it 7 times (that's over 14GB).

AFTER YOU DOWNLOAD IT, SEED IT.

Damn.

I don't have infinite bandwidth.

The people who download this are the worst fucking seeders on the fucking planet.

After I seed for the current batch of leechers I AM NOT GOING TO SEED THIS TORRENT ANYMORE, so do your fellow pirates A FUCKING FAVOR AND SEED THIS FUCKING TORRENT.

Fuck you.

I'm not seeding this anymore.
Period.
There are other versions on the net.
FUCK all you pieces of shit who downloaded this and didn't seed.
Fuck you up you asses.
I'm done.

46GB uploaded... i think i did my part.
